hero.heading: Build the Future of Bitcoin
hero.subheading: A global network of builders, learners, and Bitcoin enthusiasts exploring Layer 2 solutions and Lightning Network

sections.title: Welcome to Builder
sections.body: Builder is a global network of community-driven chapters focused on Bitcoin education, Lightning Network development, and Layer 2 exploration. Our chapters bring together developers, enthusiasts, and curious minds to learn, build, and advance Bitcoin technology together. Each chapter operates independently while sharing knowledge, resources, and best practices across the network.

sections.title: What We Do
sections.body: Builder chapters host regular meetups featuring technical presentations, hands-on workshops, and collaborative building sessions. Whether you're a seasoned Bitcoin developer or just getting started, there's a place for you in our global community. Find a chapter near you or start your own.

meta.title: Builder | Global Bitcoin Builder Network
meta.description: Join the Builder Network for Bitcoin meetups, Lightning Network education, and Layer 2 exploration. Connect with Bitcoin builders in chapters around the world.
